name: Trump vs Biden: Infinity war
description:
In this game you have to choose one of two candidates whom you want to support in this fierce battle!

Help Donald Trump stay on the political Olympus to continue his eccentric leadership of the country
Or lift up a new face - Democratic candidate Joe Biden and see what he can achieve

During this heated confrontation, you will:

  • Visit many different and unexpected locations, gaining support from the American nation
  • Always look stylish and fashionable, timely changing the outfit of the main character
  • Develop your campaign headquarters to compete with your opponent
  • Clash in a furious debate between two candidates
  • Complete the entire presidential race with your chosen one
  • Win over the most unexpected supporters to your side
  • And, of course, win without leaving your opponent a chance!
